title: Jin Hai Ge Su Si Guan
description: Chinese name 金海阁素食馆(南园店), address 福田区南园路73号(南园路口上步大厦对面). Small veggie restaurant, busy at peak meal hours. No English spoken but has picture menu. Try the lemon chicken, roast pepper beef, and sweet and sour pork. Directions by metro: Kexue Guan Station, exit D. Leave the exit, turn right on Shennan, and right at the signal on Shangbu, walk south, cross Nanyuan at the signal and veer right, restaurant is on the left.
streetAddress: 73 Nanyuan Road, Huaqiang South, Futian East
